Class ExtWindowsXPPasswordFieldUI

                          com.jgoodies.plaf.windows.ExtWindowsXPPasswordFieldUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewFactory
public final class ExtWindowsXPPasswordFieldUI
extends com.sun.java.swing.plaf.windows.WindowsPasswordFieldUI

The JGoodies Windows Look&Feel implementation of a password field UI delegate. It differs from its superclass in that it utilizes a password view that renders a circle, not a star ("*") character.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1.1.1 $
Author:
Karsten Lentzsch
